info.title: Setu BBPS BillPay
info.description: Enable easy BBPS bill payments in your App

post.description: Fetch token to be used to authorize all Setu APIs

clientID.description: clientID from the API key pair

secret.description: secret from the API key pair

token.description: Token to be used in subsequent requests

mac.description: Mandatory if channel is `INT`, `INTB`. Not required for others.

mobile.description: Mobile number with 6 to 22 digits are valid.

postalCode.description: Mandatory if channel is  `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

id.description: The ID of the agent initiating the BBPS transaction.

ifsc.description: Mandatory if channel is `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

imei.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

ip.description: Mandatory if channel is `INT`, `INTB`. Not required for others.

os.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

app.description: Mandatory if channel is `MOB`, `MOBB`. Not required for others.

channel.description:
This is the initiating channel.
1. `AGT`: Offline agent.
2. `BNKBRNCH`: Bank branch.
3. `BSC`: Business correspondent
4. `MOB`: Mobile application
5. `INT`: Internet portal
6. `INTB`: Internet banking
7. `MOBB`: Mobile banking
8. `ATM`: ATM
9. `KIOSK`: KIOSK

geocode.description: Mandatory if channel is `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

terminalId.description: Mandatory if channel is `ATM`, `AGT`, `KIOSK` and `BSC` . Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

mobile.description: Mobile number with 6 to 22 digits are valid.

customerParams.description: The bill params for fetching the bill

name.description: The display name of the parameter. This has to match what is sent in fields.

value.description: The value of the customer parameter

refId.description: The generated BBPS Reference ID for the request.
The generated BBPS Reference ID for the request.

success.description: Boolean value indicating the status of the request

traceId.description: The traceId generated for the request

refId.description: The generated BBPS Reference ID for the request.

bills.description: Multiple bills in case of response from B2B biller

minAmount.description: Minimum amount that can be paid for this bill in paise

amountMultiple.description: The payment amount should be a multiple of this value in paise.

maxAmount.description: The maximum amount that can be paid for this option in paise.

minAmount.description: The minimum amount that can be paid for this option in paise.

name.description: The display name of the option.

amount.description: The amount that can be paid for this option in paise.

amountMultiple.description: Bill payment amount should be multiple of this value in paise

maxAmount.description: Maximum amount that can be paid for this bill in paise

additionalInfo.description: This tag captures the additional information provided by the Biller as part of response for a successful transaction.

billerSelectionType.description: Defined only for billers with response type as LIST. SINGLE: User can pay only one of the bills in bill fetch response. MULTIPLE: User can pay any combination of bills in bill fetch response. ALL: User has to pay all the bills in bill fetch response.

dummyCustomerMobile.description: On debug, this hijacks the customer mobiler number COMFORT NEGATIVE 30, 31

mac.description: Mandatory if channel is `INT`, `INTB`. Not required for others.

mobile.description: Mobile number with 6 to 22 digits are valid.

postalCode.description: Mandatory if channel is  `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

id.description: The ID of the agent initiating the BBPS transaction.

ifsc.description: Mandatory if channel is `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

channel.description:

1. `AGT`: Offline agent.
2. `BNKBRNCH`: Bank branch.
3. `BSC`: Business correspondent
4. `MOB`: Mobile application
5. `INT`: Internet portal
6. `INTB`: Internet banking
7. `MOBB`: Mobile banking

geocode.description: Mandatory if channel is `AGT`, `BSC` and `BNKBRNCH`. Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

terminalId.description: Mandatory if channel is `ATM`, `AGT`, `KIOSK` and `BSC` . Not required for others. This has to match the data submitted to NPCI for this agent ID

amount.description: The amount to be paid for the selected payment option.

name.description: The name of the payment option as returned in bill fetch response.

bills.example: Selection on bills in case of list billers

dummyBillerResponseAmount.description: On debug, this is the amount passed in biller response COMFORT NEGATIVE 23

dummyOrigRefId.description: On debug, hijacks orig ref id of payment request - COMFORT PAYMENT - 83

mobile.description: Mobile number with 6 to 22 digits are valid.

name.description: The display name of the parameter. This has to match what is sent in fields.

value.description: The value of the customer parameter

parameters.name: X-PARTNER-ID
parameters.description: The Partner ID provided by Setu.

parameters.name: X-PARTNER-ID
parameters.description: The Partner ID provided by Setu.

parameters.name: months
parameters.description: Month ranges. A full-date notation as defined by 'RFC 3339, section 5.6' has to be provided but only month and year will be considered.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Mobile number with 6 to 22 digits are valid.

refId.description: The generated BBPS Reference ID for the request.

selectionType.description: Defined only for billers with response type as LIST. SINGLE: User can pay only one of the bills in bill fetch response. MULTIPLE: User can pay any combination of bills in bill fetch response. ALL: User has to pay all the bills in bill fetch response.

supportsPendingStatus.description: Flag indicating whether pending status is applicable for the biller or not

id.description: Identifier of the biller in BBPS.

bbpsUpdateTimestamp.description: Last updated date-time of the Biller accurate to the nearest day.

effectiveTo.description: Effective to date of corresponding Plan.

effectiveFrom.description: Effective from date of corresponding Plan.

categoryType.description: Plan category as defined by the Biller.

description.description: Plan description as defined by the Biller.

status.description: Effective to date of corresponding Plan.

additionalInfo.description: Plan Additional information details provided by the Biller.

categorySubType.description: Plan sub category as defined by the Biller.

payWithoutFetchAllowed.description: Flag indicating if the Biller accepts adhoc payment

parameters.name: categoryName
parameters.description: Biller category. The query parameter follows a multi instance format. Usage: categoryName=category1&categoryName=category2

parameters.name: updatedSince
parameters.description: Used to fetch billers updated since the given date-time in IST

selectionType.description: Defined only for billers with response type as LIST. SINGLE: User can pay only one of the bills in bill fetch response. MULTIPLE: User can pay any combination of bills in bill fetch response. ALL: User has to pay all the bills in bill fetch response.
